title: Is the AI Threat Overblown? Insights from State Department Commissioned Report
description: In a report released this week, a consulting firm, commissioned by the U.S. State Department, has highlighted the imminent peril posed by the rapid advancement of artificial intelligence (AI), sounding the alarm on the escalating AI Threat. The report, titled “An Action Plan to Increase the Safety and Security of Advanced AI,” underscores the pressing […]
